description: Comprehensive Quantum Computing & Quantum Physics Learning System - From qubits to quantum algorithms, hardware to error correction
author: Quantum Computing Curriculum

categories.json.description: Category definitions and topic hierarchy for quantum learning

quantum_learning_data_basics.json.description: Quantum Basics: Superposition, entanglement, wave function, measurement (8 comprehensive topics)

quantum_learning_data_qubits.json.description: Qubits: Bloch sphere, Dirac notation, Bell states, density matrix (8 topics)

quantum_learning_data_gates.json.description: Quantum Gates: Pauli, Hadamard, CNOT, rotation gates, universal sets (7 topics)

quantum_learning_data_circuits.json.description: Quantum Circuits: Circuit model, notation, depth, oracles, amplitude amplification (7 topics)

quantum_learning_data_algorithms.json.description: Quantum Algorithms: Grover's, Shor's, QFT, VQE, QAOA (5 topics)

quantum_learning_data_hardware.json.description: Quantum Hardware: Superconducting, ion trap, photonic, neutral atom, topological, decoherence (8 topics)

quantum_learning_data_error_correction.j.description: Error Correction: Error types, no-cloning, Shor/Steane/surface codes, fault tolerance (7 topics)

quantum_learning_data_cryptography.json.description: Quantum Cryptography: Quantum threat, BB84, E91, QKD security, post-quantum, lattice crypto (6 topics)

roadmaps.json.description: Career Roadmaps: Quantum Developer, Researcher, Hardware Engineer (3 comprehensive paths)

formulas.json.description: Essential formulas: 40+ formulas across 7 categories with LaTeX notation

tips.json.description: Study tips: 25 expert tips covering fundamentals, math, programming, hardware, algorithms, career

quick_reference.json.description: Quick reference: Gates, states, hardware comparison, algorithms, code snippets, notation
